articles.title: All iPhone 16 Models May Come With 'A18' Branded Chipsets: What It Means - News18
articles.description: Early leaks point towards all four new iPhone 16 models using A18 branded chipsets. Here's what we know so far.
articles.content: For two iPhone generations now, Apple has been packing an older chipset with the vanilla iPhone models. This was the case with the iPhone 14 generation when the iPhone 14 Pro debuted with the A16 Bio… [+1588 chars]
